mapper.select: /**查询全部可用数据*/ select * from suppliermanage

select * from suppliermanage A where
A.unit_name like CONCAT('%',#{unitName},'%')

select * from suppliermanage A where
A.unit_name like CONCAT('%',#{unitName},'%')
AND A.phone_number like CONCAT('%',#{phoneNumber},'%')

select * from suppliermanage A where
A.phone_number like CONCAT('%',#{phoneNumber},'%')

select * from suppliermanage A where class_name = '原材料供应商'
AND A.unit_name like CONCAT('%',#{unitName},'%')

select * from suppliermanage A where class_name = '原材料供应商'
AND A.unit_name like CONCAT('%',#{unitName},'%')
A.phone_number like CONCAT('%',#{phoneNumber},'%')

select * from suppliermanage A where class_name = '原材料供应商'
AND A.phone_number like CONCAT('%',#{phoneNumber},'%')

select * from suppliermanage A where class_name = '辅料供应商'
AND A.unit_name like CONCAT('%',#{unitName},'%')

select * from suppliermanage A where class_name = '辅料供应商'
AND A.phone_number like CONCAT('%',#{phoneNumber},'%')
select unit_name from suppliermanage where unit_code = #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
